text: The Moscow Automobile Ring Road (, Moskovskaya Koltsevaya Avtomobilnaya Doroga), or MKAD (МКАД), is a famous road around Moscow, Russia. The road was opened in 1961 as the third ring road around Moscow. == Other websites == * The MKAD on Google Maps. * A view of the MKAD from a pedestrian bridge. * A view of the MKAD from a helicopter. Category:Roads in Russia
title: Moscow Ring Road
